summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Fraktionssitzungen (Faction Meetings) feature. Successfully verified backend APIs, frontend UI components, and core functionality. AI protocol generation works, but AI invitation generation has server issues. Frontend integration and meeting management features are functional.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 520 server error during AI invitation generation

session_issues.issue: Session timeout/reset causing navigation back to login page during extended testing

passed_tests: FractionMeetings page loads correctly with proper title and navigation
New meeting form opens with all required fields (title, date, location, agenda, attendees)
Page statistics display correctly (Gesamt, Anstehend, Abgeschlossen, Mit Protokoll)
Navigation from dashboard to FractionMeetings works
Backend fraction meetings CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
AI protocol generation endpoint works correctly
PDF generation endpoints work for both invitations and protocols
Meeting form validation and field population
Tabs structure in meeting details (Ãœbersicht, Einladung, Protokoll)
Meeting attendees management with email addresses
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix AI invitation generation endpoint (/api/ai/generate-invitation) which returns 520 server error. The emergentintegrations library or API configuration may need debugging. All other functionality works correctly.
success_percentage: backend: 90% (AI invitation endpoint failing), frontend: 85% (limited by demo session stability)
